sense.def:
To intrude on someone
pomeni nekoga zmotiti, ko je na zasebnem kraju ali se pogovarja zasebno.

seg.quote: He felt that he couldn't intrude.
I don't want to intrude on your family.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
intrudes on someone's mood or someone's life
, vznemiri razpoloženje ali življenje nekega človeka ali ima neprijeten vpliv nanj.

seg.quote: I shall not intrude on your grief.
